SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository URI" :SET &UC4RB_CVS_URI# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_URI#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_CVS_URI# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Working Copy" :SET &UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" :SET &UC4RB_CVS_TARGET_PATH# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_TARGET_PATH#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_CVS_TARGET_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Message" :SET &UC4RB_CVS_MESSAGE# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_MESSAGE#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_CVS_MESSAGE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Module" :SET &UC4RB_CVS_MODULE# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_MODULE#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_CVS_MODULE# echo "********************************"
